name: EAST NORRITON MEDICAL ASSOCIATES, LTD., Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF REVENUE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: East Norriton Medical Associates, Ltd. v. Commonwealth

judges: MONTEMURO, J., participates by designation as a senior judge as provided by Rule of Judicial Administration 701(f).
parties: EAST NORRITON MEDICAL ASSOCIATES, LTD., Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF REVENUE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 28th day of December, 1995, the order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby affirmed.
MONTEMURO, J., participates by designation as a senior judge as provided by Rule of Judicial Administration 701(f).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

668 A.2d 1113
EAST NORRITON MEDICAL ASSOCIATES, LTD., Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF REVENUE, Appellee.
